# SingleStoreTransaction.IsolationLevel property

Gets the `IsolationLevel` of this transaction. This value is set from [`BeginTransaction`](../SingleStoreConnection/BeginTransaction.md) or any other overload that specifies an `IsolationLevel`.

```csharp
public override IsolationLevel IsolationLevel { get; }
```
